data.title: Why Tori Spelling and Dean McDermott broke up and full timeline
data.meta_description: Explore Tori Spelling and Dean McDermott's rocky marriage, infidelity, and split. Discover what led to their divorce after nearly 20 years. Read the full story now!
data.text:
Once the epitome of Hollywood's tumultuous yet enduring love stories, Tori Spelling and Dean McDermott decided to call it quits in 2023 after nearly two decades together. As the news of their breakup spread, many fans were left wondering: What led to the end of the seemingly unbreakable bond between them?

TABLE OF CONTENTS

The beginning of Tori Spelling and Dean McDermott relationship

Tori Spelling and Dean McDermott marriage timeline

Dean admits to cheating on Tori

The third proposal

Tori and Dean's marital problems come to light again

Letting the cat out of the bag

Tori Spelling files for divorce

FAQs about Tori Spelling and Dean McDermott

Final word

The end of a high-profile celebrity marriage often leaves a trail of speculation and intrigue, and the breakup of Tori Spelling and Dean McDermott has not been an exception. As news of Tori Spelling divorce from Dean makes headlines, fans have been wondering what truly led to the demise of their marriage.

The beginning of Tori Spelling and Dean McDermott relationship

Victoria Davey Spelling, better known as Tori Spelling, is an American actress, TV personality, and author. On the other hand, Dean McDermott is a Canadian actor well-known for his reality TV appearances with Tori Spelling and as the host of Chopped Canada.

The two met in Ottawa, Canada, while filming Mind Over Murder. At that time, Tori Spelling's ex-husband, Charlie Shanian, was still in the picture. McDermott was also married to Mary Jo Eustace.

Shortly after Spelling's divorce from Shanian and McDermott's separation from Eustace, they married in a private ceremony in Fiji on May 7, 2006.

In May 2010, Spelling and McDermott renewed their vows at a private home in Beverly Hills. McDermott marked the occasion by gifting Spelling a custom Darkened Diamond Eternity Band by Neil Lane.

Tori Spelling and Dean McDermott marriage timeline

The couple welcomed their first child in March 2007, shortly before debuting their first reality Television show, Tori & Dean: Inn Love.‚Äù

Following two successful seasons of Tori and Dean: Inn Love, Spelling and McDermott's reality show returned for a third season on Oxygen under the new title Tori & Dean: Home Sweet Hollywood.

However, rumors that the couple was having trouble started spreading in 2013. Dean McDermott's spouse, Spelling, refuted the claims.

"It's just sad that our actual happiness would probably be deemed boring. I can handle [media scrutiny.] I always have. But don't do it to a man that has done nothing but loved me and our children." she said.

But, by the end of 2013, McDermott's infidelity came to light, marking a significant downturn in their relationship.

Dean admits to cheating on Tori

In 2014, Dean McDermott admitted publicly to having an affair. News later broke that he had been cheating on her with Emily Goodhand.

The affair was later discussed on the family's new reality show, True Tori. Here, Dean claimed that he felt ashamed and disgusted by his behavior.

In one of the episodes of True Tori, she claimed that she was aware of her inability to satisfy McDermott sexually.

Meanwhile, McDermott had an emotional breakdown on the show, admitting,

"I thought, 'This is it. There's no way out. I ruined everything good in my life.' I felt like Tori would be better off if I died,"

Later that year, Tori confirmed that they would be working to mend the relationship while admitting that it would take some time.

The third proposal

Dean proposed to Tori again two years later in Paris, this time after the whole family had traveled to Europe. Later that year, the couple announced their fifth pregnancy.

Tori and Dean's marital problems come to light again

In August 2020, Tori Spelling was hosted on the Women on Top podcast as a guest. It was here that she admitted that Dean's past infidelity instances were starting to cause problems again.

She claimed that their daughter had seen clips online about her father's past, which made her upset.

During this interview, she also explained why they chose to reconcile despite the challenges, claiming that she had genuine affection for him and liked their mutual commitment to working things out.

The following year (2021), while she was on SiriusXM's Jeff Lewis Live, Tori admitted that she and Dean were sleeping in separate rooms. She added that she only shared her bed with her kids and dogs.

The same year, Spelling attracted attention when she was seen without her wedding band during a public appearance. This also prompted fans to observe that she and McDermott did not publicly recognize their 15th anniversary in May.

Letting the cat out of the bag

There were significant trust issues for Spelling following McDermott's infidelity, and their relationship never fully recovered from it. McDermott's ongoing battles with sobriety also posed a continuous challenge for the couple throughout the years.

The couple did not announce their separation until June 2023, when Dean posted on Instagram.

"It's with great sadness and a very very heavy heart that after 18 years together and five amazing children, that @torispelling and I have decided to go our separate ways and start a new journey of our own," part of the caption said.

McDermott addressed his celebrity life and separation from Spelling publicly for the first time in a detailed interview with the Daily Mail. He disclosed that he had not been in physical contact with his estranged wife or their children since June 2023 but emphasized ongoing communication with Spelling.

McDermott mentioned that the decision to sleep separately from Spelling over the years had played a role in the deterioration of their relationship.

By the end of 2023, both seemed to have moved on and started new relationships. McDermott is now dating Lily Calo, while Spelling was seen sharing kisses with Ryan Cramer, the CEO of Neuron Syndicate Inc.,

Tori Spelling files for divorce

Spelling filed for divorce nine months after McDermott made their breakup public on social media. Court documents reveal that Spelling listed "irreconcilable differences" as the explanation for their separation. In addition to asking for joint legal custody of their five children, she also seeks spousal support and sole physical custody.

Tori decided to officially file for divorce around the same time she launched her podcast, misSpelling. In one of the episodes, she mentioned noticing warning signs right from the start of their relationship.

FAQs about Tori Spelling and Dean McDermott

Is Tori Spelling getting divorced? Yes, Tori filed for divorce in March 2024

Who is Tori Spelling's ex husband? Tori was married to Charlie Shanian before meeting McDermott

Is Tori Spelling still married to Dean McDermott? Yes, Tori is still officially married to Dean, as their divorce hasn't been finalized yet.

Does Tori Spelling and Dean McDermott stay together? No, the two went separate ways in June last year.

Who is Dean McDermott dating now? McDermott is currently dating Lily Calo.

Who is Tori Spelling dating now? Even though not officially confirmed, it is rumored Tori is dating the CEO of Neuron Syndicate Inc., Ryan Cramer.

Do Tori Spelling and Dean McDermott have kids? Yes, the couple had five kids during their 18-year marriage.

Why is Tori divorcing again? Tori Spelling cited irreconcilable differences as the reason to file for divorce.

Final word

The relationship between Tori Spelling and Dean McDermott has been marked by highs and lows over nearly two decades. Despite reconciliation efforts, including renewed vows and public admissions of challenges, trust issues and personal growth diverged their paths. Their decision to separate in mid-2023, followed by Tori Spelling's filing for divorce in early 2024, signals the end of an era.
